overview: I love my husband, and I stand by his decisions.  When he told me that Tyler was smoking, I told my husband that I would confront Tyler.  Tyler and I have a close relationship, and I know if I ask him to stop, he will.  I'm the type of stepmother who likes to keep the peace in the house.  Tyler and his father are always at odds, and it's my role to referee.  I went into Tyler's room so that I could confront him with the evidence, and his laptop was on his bed.  I don't know what came over me, I couldn't help but look inside.
title: A Mother's Confession
